history.proof: intros d a b. induction b as [|d' n' IHb]. - rewrite mult_mon_zero_r. rewrite is_nil_id. reflexivity. - simpl. scongruence use: proj_ok, Nat.add_sub unfold: pmon1.

original: intros d a b. induction b as [|d' n' IHb]. - rewrite mult_mon_zero_r. rewrite is_nil_id. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite mdiv_div. rewrite recomp_ok. reflexivity. + apply mdiv_cons. * apply Nat.le_refl. * apply IHb.
